# UIDocumentPickerDelegate

**Protocol**

A set of methods for tracking when the user selects a document or destination, or cancels the operation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UIDocumentPickerDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Responding to user actions

- **documentPicker(_:didPickDocumentsAt:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has selected one or more documents.
- **documentPickerWasCancelled(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the user canceled the document picker.
- **documentPicker(_:didPickDocumentAt:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has selected a document or a destination.

## Getting the user-selected document

- **delegate**: An object that acts as the delegate of the view controller.
- **allowsMultipleSelection**: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select more than one document at a time.
- **directoryURL**: The initial directory that the document picker displays.
